ygData.subject: Re: Random magic duration do you like it? wizard loos er?
ygData.msgSnippet: No, invisibility has the unfortunate trick of suddenly blinking you into sight with no warning.  It s often been suggested that it have a flash warning.
ygData.messageBody:
No, invisibility has the unfortunate trick of suddenly blinking you into
sight with no warning. It's often been suggested that it have a flash
warning.

However, you cannot cast spells while invisible. So, even if there was a
nice warning blink before your invisibility spell ran out, recasting
invisibility wouldn't help very much in those unfortunate situations where
you don't want to pop into view.

Now, as to why it's a Divination spell...

-- Magistris of Felwithe
